Package com.example.service

Class ArtistService

java.lang.Object
com.example.service.ArtistService
@Service public class ArtistService extends Object
Service for working with artists. Provides methods for retrieving information about artists, including searching by name and getting an artist by ID.

    • ArtistService

      public ArtistService()

  • Method Details

    • getAllArtistsByName

      public ArtistSearchResponseDto getAllArtistsByName(String name, int offset, int limit)
      Get all artists matching the search query by name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the artist to search for (can be null or empty to retrieve all artists)
      offset - the offset for pagination
      limit - the number of items per page
      Returns:
      an ArtistSearchResponseDto object containing the list of artists and pagination information

    • getArtistById

      public ArtistResponseDto getArtistById(long artistId)
      Get an artist by their ID.
      Parameters:
      artistId - the artist's ID
      Returns:
      an ArtistResponseDto object containing the artist's information
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException - if no artist with the given ID is found
